alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 4:19AM PST until January 22 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Local gusts up to 60 mph possible in wind-favored areas. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Central Coast. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highways 1 and 101.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Central Coast
